com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class GlobalPageFeedbackViewProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.EntityViewProcessorAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.GlobalPageFeedbackViewProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityViewProcessor

    @Component
 @Exposed
public final class GlobalPageFeedbackViewProcessor
extends EntityViewProcessorAdapter
    Checks if there is global feedback present on the model and renders it in the PageContentStructure. Feedback should be registered as either model attribute or request parameter FEEDBACK_ATTRIBUTE_KEY. If both are present, first the feedback defined as request parameter will be retrieved, followed by the feedback as model attribute.

    The feedback attribute is a formatted string of STYLE:MESSAGE_CODE. Helper method addFeedbackMessage(Map, Style, String) is available for building the feedback values.

    Feedback messages will be added as dismissible alerts to the PageContentStructure feedback.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    EntityViewPageHelper.addGlobalFeedbackAfterRedirect(EntityViewRequest, Style, String)

        public static Map<String,Style> addFeedbackMessage(Map<String,Style> currentValue,

        Add a feedback message (combination of message code and style) to an attribute.
        Parameters:
        currentValue - map holding the current resolved messages and their style to add the feedback to.
        feedbackStyle - style of the feedback
        message - resolved message
        Returns:
        new map holding the existing messages and the new message.
